Elements.Body: So you remember that girl Sasha that I told you about this morning at Effy’s? Well, I messaged her - and don’t worry, I didn’t give any specifics - she seemed to be pretty shaken up by this stuff going on. I actually felt bad...like if she had the update, or even knew a bit more about it like we do, she’d probably be at ease.
I’m not sure telling her more about the Nightmares would help.
Do you think she would actually want to be involved with any of this?

I told her I would talk to her some more soon. I guess she figures the same thing’s been going on with me or something? I want to be totally honest with her, though. I really think we could do some good if we start getting other people like Sasha involved, you know? People who actually care.

I told her I would talk to her some more soon. I guess she figures the same thing’s been going on with me or something? I want to be totally honest with her, though. I really think we could do some good if we start getting other people like Sasha involved, you know? People who actually care.
Caring about something and doing something about it are two different things...
Would you be okay with being the one who shares that knowledge?

You know, I can’t really imagine myself being at the center of this, to be honest. For christ’s sake, I only found about any of this yesterday. But if it needs to get out there somehow, and I’m the one to do it, and that ends up meaning I’m some sort of leader, some sort of center to this, I can only play it by ear. I mean no one really “prepares” for something like this.

You know, I can’t really imagine myself being at the center of this, to be honest. For christ’s sake, I only found about any of this yesterday. But if it needs to get out there somehow, and I’m the one to do it, and that ends up meaning I’m some sort of leader, some sort of center to this, I can only play it by ear. I mean no one really “prepares” for something like this.
That’s a little reckless, you know that?
I have to give you credit for being so levelheaded.
